argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummptun.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | gsummptun.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | gsummptun.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | gsummptun.w | |- ( ph -> W e. CMnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsummptun.a | |- ( ph -> ( A u. C ) e. Fin ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptun.d | |- ( ph -> ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) |
| 7 |  | gsummptun.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A u. C ) ) -> D e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( A u. C ) = ( A u. C ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 6, 8 | #P_gsummptfidmsplit | |- ( ph -> ( W gsum ( x e. ( A u. C ) |-> D ) ) = ( ( W gsum ( x e. A |-> D ) ) .+ ( W gsum ( x e. C |-> D ) ) ) ) |
